credit_limit.description: The credit limit assigned to the customer

registered_at.description: Date and time when the customer registered

last_visit_at.description: Date and time of the customer's last visit

adcode.description: Unique identifier for the adcode associated with the customer

adcode_id.description: ID of the adcode for reference

affiliate_id.description: ID of the affiliate associated with the customer

customer_type_id.description: ID representing the type of customer

is_no_tax_customer.description: Flag indicating if the customer is exempt from taxes

is_inactive.description: Flag indicating if the customer is inactive

lock_default_address.description: Flag indicating if the customer's default address is locked

comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the customer

store_id.description: ID of the store associated with the customer

source.description: Source from which the customer originated

search_string.description: String used for searching customer information

no_account.description: Flag indicating if the customer has no account

sales_person.description: Name of the sales person associated with the customer

alternate_phone_number.description: Secondary phone number of the customer

is_affiliate_customer.description: Flag indicating if the customer is an affiliate

updated_at.description: Date and time when the customer record was last updated

created_at.description: Date and time when the customer record was created

is_contact_information_only.description: Flag indicating if the customer has only contact information without full account details

tax_exemption_number.description: Tax exemption number of the customer

source_group.description: Group to which the source belongs

sales_person_user_id.description: ID of the sales person user

store_payment_methods_enabled.description: Payment methods enabled for the store

tax_rate.description: Tax rate applicable to the customer

reward_tier_id.description: ID representing the reward tier of the customer

sub.description: Sub information related to the customer

customer_payment_methods_availability.description: Availability of payment methods for the customer
